# PTD Today Daily Intelligence Brief

---

## 1) Top Themes  
- Oil & Gas geopolitical tensions (US interest in Venezuela oil, US strikes impact)  
- Infrastructure disruptions impacting transport (Greece flight grounding due to radio collapse)  
- No notable updates on grid/transmission, renewables, data centers/AI, semiconductors, or critical minerals in the last 24 hours  

## 2) Top Stories  
- Flights in Greece were grounded due to a radio communication collapse, disrupting air traffic (Source: Reuters).  
- The US shows strategic interest in Venezuelan oil as geopolitical dynamics unfold (Source: CNN).  
- US strikes in Venezuela have caused civilian displacement and homelessness (Source: CNN).  
- Victims of a Swiss bar fire are being mourned as identification efforts continue (Source: Reuters).  

## 3) Sector Takeaways  
- **Grid/Transmission:** Not enough information in the headline.  
- **Renewables:** No relevant updates.  
- **Oil & Gas:**  
  - US geopolitical and military actions are intensifying around Venezuela, indicating higher risk and volatility in regional oil supply.  
- **Data Centers & AI:** Not enough information in the headline.  
- **Critical Minerals:** Not enough information in the headline.  

## 4) Notable Companies/Regions

- Greece (Infrastructure and transport disruption)
